visualization_prompt: Generate a column chart showing browser market share distribution using the series.keys option for conditional data label visibility
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains 10 categorical data points representing browser market shares (percentage values). Synthetic data was generated with μ=10% and σ=12% to simulate real-world market distribution, maintaining a total sum of 100%. Two entries (Chrome/Edge) have explicit data label visibility overrides. The column chart minimizes data-ink ratio by eliminating gridlines and using direct labels. Cairo's perceptual principles are applied through color-by-point differentiation and position-encoding for percentages. Statistical validity is ensured with synthetic data showing power-law distribution (common in market share contexts) and intentional outliers ('Others' category).
